title: 100 Boxes WiiU
author: Cid2mizard
description: A simple yet challenging puzzle game.
details:
100 Boxes WiiU is a simple yet challenging puzzle game.

Gameplay: - Fill all the boxes of a 10x10 grid. If you move horizontally or vertically you must skip 2 boxes. If you move diagonally you must skip 1 box.

Controls : - Touch or D-pad + A : Discover Case - B : New Game - Plus : Exit

Original game : - http://helmet.kafuka.org/

Changelog :
1.0

Initial Release
